alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued April 22 at 2:45PM CDT until April 24 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. * WHERE...In Illinois, Bond IL, Fayette IL, Montgomery IL, Calhoun IL, Greene IL, Jersey IL, Macoupin IL, and Madison IL Counties. In Missouri, Jefferson MO County. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
